Lyric:
[by:柠檬味海风Sound]

[00:08.08]Stick, stick to your stones cause that's all you know
[00:13.50]I was caught in the middle
[00:15.91]I swallow my words down to the bone
[00:21.87]Cause nothing's that simple
[00:24.15]Late at night you pour it out
[00:31.91]Know that only brings you down
[00:39.44]But go ahead give me all the blame
[00:43.97]Yeah, twist my words and set them to flame, woah
[00:51.25]We all know
[00:55.99]That you'll go tell all of your friends
[00:59.93]That I'm the one you wish you never met
[01:03.42]And woah
[01:07.48]We all know
[01:10.72]The story never ends
[01:18.54]The story never ends
[01:27.79]Wound me like a toy spinning too fast
[01:33.86]In every direction
[01:35.99]How, how could I stay when you lit a match to all my intentions?
[01:44.27]Late at night you pour it out
[01:51.93]Know that only brings you down
[01:59.83]But go ahead give me all the blame
[02:03.60]Yeah, twist my words and set them to flame, woah
[02:11.58]We all know
[02:15.88]That you'll go tell all of your friends
[02:19.92]That I'm the one you wish you never met
[02:23.48]And woah
[02:27.25]We all know
[02:30.58]The story never ends
[02:38.77]The story never ends
[02:48.04]That’s who you are
[02:50.91]Crash the car
[02:52.91]And blame the road
[02:56.08]Never your fault
[02:58.94]After all
[03:00.98]I would know
[03:04.59]The story never ends
